txt.en: Attacks with Melee skills will tier up the 'Inspiriting' buff, which increases your Outgoing Healing.\n\nWith 5 stacks, you can spend them to use 'Gift of Spirit' to heal yourself or an ally.
Attacks with Melee skills will tier up the 'Inspiriting' buff, which increases your Outgoing Healing.\n\nWith 5 stacks, you can spend them to use 'Gift of Spirit' to heal yourself or an ally.
